text: tam budʹ-yakyy rivnyy do khto kontrolyuye kozhnu yedynu dushu? Dosi, vony vstanovlyuyutʹ idoliv konkuruvaty BOH. Skazhitʹ, "Nazyvayutʹ yikh. Vy informuyete Yoho shchosʹ na zemli shcho Vin ne znaye? Abo, vy vyhotovlyayete porozhni tverdzhennya?" Diysno, skhemy tsykh khto disbelieve buv prykrashenyy u yikhnikh ochakh. Vony takym chynom vidvodyatʹsya z prava shlyakh. Whomever BOH posylaye astray mozhe nikoly ne znayty keruyuchyy uchytelem
